title: Azure Service Fabric CLI Repository
body:
Service Fabric CLI (sfctl) repository: https://github.com/Azure/service-fabric-cli

Command-line tools for managing Azure Service Fabric clusters and applications. The sfctl tool provides capabilities for:
- Cluster management and monitoring
- Application deployment and lifecycle
- Service management
- Diagnostics and troubleshooting

Install via: pip install sfctl

Use this repository for CLI issues, feature requests, and understanding Service Fabric command-line automation.
